The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2020, indicating the date of its circulation.
The post: s caption in regional Tamil language was translated, providing context about the photo and its connection to the Pongal festival in Tamil Nadu.
A reverse image search was conducted: revealing that the photo was originally taken by Reuters and showing a traffic jam in China on October 6, 2015.
Additional evidence was gathered: including a screenshot of the Reuters report, drone footage on YouTube, and tweets from Chinese media outlets, confirming the authenticity of the photo and its depiction of a traffic jam in Beijing.
